DOC.criteria: Patients undergo ureteral stent placement Patients allergic sulpha contain medication Ureteral stent insertion infect hydronephrosis Patients develop septic complication require antibiotic treatment stent placement Patients need bilateral stent Patients chronic kidney disease grade IV V ( GFR < 30ml/min ) Immunocompromised patient malignancy organ transplantation .
